product_name: Solid Color Cowl Neck Cross Spaghetti Strap Backless Boho Dresses
image_description: The first image showcases a white dress featuring a cowl neck design and cross spaghetti straps, emphasizing a fitted bodice that flows into a layered skirt. The fabric appears smooth and has a slight sheen, suggesting a lightweight material suitable for warm weather. The second image presents the back view of the same dress, highlighting the intricate crisscross strap design and a tie closure at the back, which adds a touch of elegance. The layered skirt is also visible, maintaining the same flowy aesthetic.
